iterm2.notes: Application cursor keys mode via cursorMode property

konsole.notes: Application cursor keys mode (DECCKM) fully supported

xterm.notes: DECCOLM (mode 3) - 132/80 column switching. Requires c132 resource and allowWindowOps

alacritty.notes: Reported as not supported; clears grid but doesn't change width

vte.notes: DEC_132_COLUMN mode; controlled by XTERM_DECCOLM flag

windows_terminal.notes: Requires XTERM_EnableDECCOLMSupport mode 40 to be enabled

konsole.notes: 80/132 column switching supported with MODE_Allow132Columns guard

mintty.notes: DECCOLM (Mode 3) implemented at src/termout.c:2397-2409. Can be disabled via mode 40

iterm2.notes: Reverse video mode via reverseVideo property

konsole.notes: Reverse video mode (MODE_Screen) for light backgrounds

mintty.notes: DECSCNM (Mode 5) reverse video implemented at src/termout.c:2410-2414

__compat.title: DECOM
__compat.description: Mode 6 — Origin mode (relative to scroll region)

xterm.notes: DECOM (mode 6) - Origin mode (relative to scroll region)

iterm2.notes: Origin mode for cursor positioning relative to scroll region

konsole.notes: Origin mode for relative positioning within scroll region

mintty.notes: DECOM (Mode 6) origin mode implemented at src/termout.c:2415-2420

__compat.title: DECAWM
__compat.description: Mode 7 — Auto-wrap at end of line

xterm.notes: DECAWM (mode 7) - Auto-wrap at end of line
Mode 12 - att610 blinking cursor. Requires OPT_BLINK_CURS compile option

iterm2.notes: Cursor blink control via blinkingCursor property

konsole.notes: Mode 12 (att610 cursor blink) escape sequences are explicitly ignored; cursor blinking is controlled via profile settings

mintty.notes: Mode 12 blinking cursor implemented at src/termout.c:2433-2436

xterm.notes: VT200 feature, implemented early in xterm history

__compat.title: Reverse wrap
__compat.description: Mode 45 — BS wraps to previous line

xterm.notes: Original mode 45 implemented in patch 380, extended mode 1045 in patch 383

iterm2.notes: Requires VT400 emulation level or higher

ghostty.notes: No Sixel support found in codebase

konsole.notes: Controls Sixel scrolling mode via m_SixelScrolling flag

__compat.title: Alt screen
__compat.description: Mode 1049 — Alternate screen buffer with cursor save

iterm2.notes: Can be disabled via disableSmcupRmcup setting

konsole.notes: Combines cursor save, clear screen, and alternate buffer

mintty.notes: Implemented at src/termout.c:2539; can be disabled via config

xterm_js.notes: Does not clear alternate buffer on switch

xterm.notes: Requires OPT_FOCUS_EVENT compile flag (enabled by default)

iterm2.notes: Requires focus reporting to be allowed by delegate

konsole.notes: Uses _reportFocusEvents flag, sends CSI I/O sequences

__compat.title: SGR mouse
__compat.description: Mode 1006 — Decimal encoding, no coord limit

__compat.title: Alt scroll
__compat.description: Mode 1007 — Wheel sends arrows in alt screen

xterm_js.notes: Implemented in viewport, not as explicit mode toggle

xterm.notes: Requires OPT_PASTE64 compile flag (enabled by default)

iterm2.notes: Can be disabled via allowPasteBracketing setting

kitty.notes: Always active, not toggleable via mode

windows_terminal.notes: GCM_GraphemeClusterMode at adaptDispatch.cpp:1886-1887, reported as permanently enabled/disabled at adaptDispatch.cpp:2027-2029

mintty.notes: Mode 2027 is used for emoji width mode, not grapheme clustering; comment at src/termout.c:2628 says '2027 is dropped'

xterm_js.notes: Grapheme clustering exists internally but no mode toggle
Added after 6.0.0, not yet in a release tag

cy.notes: Mode tracked but logged as not implemented

__compat.title: LNM
__compat.description: ANSI Mode 20 — Newline mode (LF also does CR)

iterm2.notes: Explicitly not supported per source comment

konsole.notes: MODE_NewLine controls LF behavior (also performs CR)
